name: conjunction
description: Conjunction is a utility for Sitecore that solves the issue of creating configurable and personalizable queries for either the Lucene or Solr search engine, using Sitecore's ContentSearch API as the backbone.

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rimraf _book && gitbook build
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m "Update docs" && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git reset -- tools/* && git commit -am "Update docs" && git push https://github.com/soen/Conjunction.git gh-pages --force
